name: Down the Machine World
description:
In this game, you will take control of a little droid and descend deep into Machine World. On your journey, you will encounter uncomplicated puzzles but challenging arenas. Uncover the secrets to enhance your abilities, use your arsenal to deal with the enemies, dash through obstacles to make your way down the Machine World.

Submission for LDJam 48: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/down-the-machine-world
